titles.title: Increasing America's Global Development Capacity Act of 2009
A bill to enhance the capacity of the United States to undertake global development activities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1066)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
1/29/2009--Introduced.
Increasing America's Global Development Capacity Act of 2009 - Requires the Administrator of the United States Agency for International Development (USAID) to increase the number of full-time Foreign Service officers employed by USAID.
